title: Slow Cooker Pot Roast Recipe
directions: Place the chuck roasts in a 5-qt. slow cooker. In a small bowl, combine the salad dressings and gravy mix; stir in water. Pour over meat. Cover and cook on low for 7-8 hours or until tender. If desired, sprinkle with parsley and thicken cooking juices for gravy
ingredients: 2 boneless beef chuck roasts (2-1/2 pounds each)
